name: cfg-degree-fullstack-group-project-2024
description: This repository contains the group project work for the CFG Fullstack Degree of summer 2024: "Festival Meetup" app.

scripts.build: rmdir /S /Q .\backend\static && mkdir .\backend\static && cd frontend && npm run build && xcopy .\build\* ..\backend\static\ /E /I /Y
